summary: I RECEIVED A RECALL NOTICE LABELED "OCCUPANT RESTRAINT CONTROLLER" OVER ONE YEAR AGO AND THE DEALERSHIP HAS NEVER RECEIVED PARTS FOR REPAIR. (REF: S61/NHTSA 16V-668)  IN THE MEANTIME, I CONTINUE TO DRIVE A DEFECTIVE VEHICLE WITH A SIGNIFICANT SAFETY HAZARD: "MAY EXPERIENCE A LOSS OF AIRBAG AND SEATBELT PRETENSIONER CAPABILITY" 7/1/17  UPDATED 11/06/2017*JS
